name: design.toml

design.name: ElderCare Design System
design.description: Visual design for elderly care services platform

rawContent:
# ElderCare - Design Specifications

[design]
name = "ElderCare Design System"
description = "Visual design for elderly care services platform"
approach = "ui-kit"
framework = "React with Tailwind CSS"

[design.theme]
mode = "light"
primary = "cyan"
radius = "0.75rem"  # Rounded, friendly appearance

[design.typography]
fontFamily = "Inter, system-ui, sans-serif"
monoFamily = "JetBrains Mono, monospace"
baseSize = "16px"
headings = { weight = "600", tracking = "tight" }
largeTouchTargets = true  # Important for elderly users

[design.layout]
strategy = "mobile-first"
maxWidth = "100%"
containerPadding = "1rem"
headerHeight = "56px"
spacing = "8px base unit"

[design.components]
buttonStyle = "rounded"
buttonSize = "lg"       # Large buttons for accessibility
cardStyle = "shadow"    # Clear visual hierarchy
inputStyle = "outlined"
inputSize = "lg"        # Large inputs
iconSize = "24px"

[design.accessibility]
target = "wcag-aa"
minTouchTarget = "44px"
fontScaling = true
highContrast = false

[design.localization]
primaryLanguage = "he"
rtlSupport = true
prototypeLanguage = "en"
additionalLanguages = ["en"]

[design.palette]
background = "#f8fafc"   # Slate-50
foreground = "#1e293b"   # Slate-800
muted = "#f1f5f9"
mutedForeground = "#64748b"  # Slate-500
primary = "#0891b2"      # Cyan-600 - trustworthy, healthcare
primaryForeground = "#ffffff"
secondary = "#0d9488"    # Teal-600 - calm, professional
secondaryForeground = "#ffffff"
accent = "#f59e0b"       # Amber-500 - warmth, attention
accentForeground = "#ffffff"
success = "#22c55e"      # Green-500
warning = "#f59e0b"      # Amber-500
destructive = "#ef4444"  # Red-500
border = "#e2e8f0"

[design.patterns]
navigation = "bottom-nav"
forms = "single-column"
lists = "card-based"
modals = "bottom-sheet"

[design.principles]
list = [
  "Clean and minimal interface",
  "Large touch targets for accessibility",
  "Clear visual hierarchy",
  "Professional healthcare appearance",
  "Mobile-first responsive design"
]
